channel.title: Tau Cannon Particle Issues
channel.description:
I was playing with the tau cannon for 10 minutes in my own server and I changed weapons. I noticed that the effects were being applied to the other weapons. A couple more fast weapon changes later I got this(srry huge picture):[spoiler] [img]https://i.imgur.com/TaM7UQZ.jpg[/img] [/spoiler]
Also, Shotgun: Consider making the shotgun not attack after the first click when interrupting the reload animation. In otherwords, during reload the first click will ready the weapon\rack the slide but will not shoot until a second click. This will make it so much more useful to interrupt shotgun reload.

item.title: Tau Cannon Particle Issues
item.dc:creator: LamarrsAnomaly
item.description:
I experienced this issue as well today. I grabbed a screenshot of the console shortly after the issue.

2015-05-09_00004.jpg1920×1080 353 KB

item.title: Tau Cannon Particle Issues
item.dc:creator: Kil3r
item.description:
I was playing with the tau cannon for 10 minutes in my own server and I changed weapons. I noticed that the effects were being applied to the other weapons. A couple more fast weapon changes later I got this(srry huge picture):

1920×1080

Also,
Shotgun: Consider making the shotgun not attack after the first click when interrupting the reload animation. In otherwords, during reload the first click will ready the weapon\rack the slide but will not shoot until a second click. This will make it so much more useful to interrupt shotgun reload.

Read full topic
